property.name: aboutText
property.value:
AudioSolutions 9 Copyright (C) 2024 Christoph Korn
AudioSolutions is the software solution for all audio related issues like: - converting to MP3 - editing ID3 tags - renaming files - and many more...
Moreover, AudioSolutions allows to manage audio files and offers a fast search engine. It can handle thousand files and many more.
I hope you enjoy AudioSolutions.
